name: Your Toybox Castle
description:
Build a toybox castle with the given material.

  • Build a castle via drag and drop
  • Click on the treetop to get new tiles
  • Rotate things with mousewheel
  • Scale things with arrow keys
  • Toggle Physics with P key
  • Right click on a tile starts platformer mode (move around with W,A,S keys)
  • Paint Mode: Click on the feather:
    - Right click erases.
    - Middle Mousebutton click exits it.
  • Double click on middle mouse button: Textfield cretation to name your Castle (only once).

Originally made for MiniLD #68. Theme: Childhood Memories.
